Test Case Name: TC01_Verify Form ZC 6356 Latest Edition Display in Inland Marine Coverage Selection_Inland Marine_New Business_R1
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that the Contractors Equipment form ZC 6356 with latest 03/25 edition is displayed when user selects the coverage in Inland Marine LOB
Action: 1. Navigate to Phoenix submission creation screen
Expected Result: 1. User should be able to view the submission creation screen with all required fields

Action: 2. Create a Domestic submission with Inland Marine LOB
Expected Result: 2. User should be able to create a submission successfully and proceed to line selection

Action: 3. Verify effective date is August release date
Expected Result: 3. User should verify that the form effective date is set to August release date

Action: 4. Navigate to Inland Marine screen and select Contractors Equipment Coverage
Expected Result: 4. User should be able to view the Inland Marine screen with all mandatory fields displayed

Action: 5. Verify form ZC 6356 is listed in coverage options
Expected Result: 5. User should verify that form ZC 6356 is available and selectable in the Contractors Equipment coverage options

Action: 6. Verify form edition date is "03/25"
Expected Result: 6. User should verify that the form edition date displays as "03/25" (March 2025 edition)

Action: 7. Verify form version information
Expected Result: 7. User should verify that form version and edition date are properly displayed with correct metadata

Action: 8. Proceed to pricing
Expected Result: 8. User should be able to successfully proceed to pricing screen

Test Case Name: TC02_Verify Form ZC 6356 Auto-Attachment on Coverage Selection_Inland Marine_New Business_R2
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that the Contractors Equipment form ZC 6356 with latest edition is automatically attached to documents when user selects the coverage
Action: 1. Navigate to Phoenix submission creation screen
Expected Result: 1. User should be able to view the submission creation screen

Action: 2. Create a Domestic submission with Inland Marine LOB
Expected Result: 2. User should be able to create a submission successfully

Action: 3. Navigate to Inland Marine screen
Expected Result: 3. User should be able to view the Inland Marine screen

Action: 4. Select Contractors Equipment Coverage
Expected Result: 4. Inland Marine configuration screen should display coverage options

Action: 5. Select form ZC 6356 from coverage options
Expected Result: 5. Form ZC 6356 should be automatically added to the documents section

Action: 6. Navigate to documents section
Expected Result: 6. User should be able to view the documents section with attached forms

Action: 7. Verify that form ZC 6356 is attached with latest version
Expected Result: 7. User should verify that the attached form is the latest 03/25 edition

Action: 8. Verify form is not old version
Expected Result: 8. User should confirm that old form versions are not attached

Action: 9. Verify form versioning metadata
Expected Result: 9. User should verify that form metadata displays correct version and edition date information
